name: 甘奈
text:
……あっ！
ここからでも、川の音が聞こえるよ、すごーい！
trans: Ah! Wow, you can still here the sound of the river even from here!

name: 千雪
text:
ここの露天風呂、
自然をすぐ側で感じられるのが特徴なんだって
trans: They say that the open air bath of this place makes you feel very close to nature.

name: 千雪
text:
それに、明るい時間にお風呂から見る景色は
とっても綺麗らしいの
trans: And also, it seems that the view seen when taking a batch during the day is really wonderful.

name: 甘奈
text:
そうなんだ～！
じゃあ、明日の朝にまた入ろうよ！
trans: Oh! How about we take another bath tomorrow morning?

name: 甜花
text:
朝……
起きられる、かな……
trans: Can Tenka... be up early by morning?

name: 甘奈
text:
大丈夫だよ～
甘奈がちゃんと起こしてあげる！
trans: Don't worry about it. I'll be sure to wake you up!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、温泉でゆっくりしてからぐっすり眠れば、
気持ちよく起きられると思うわ
trans: Fufu, seeing that we took our time at the hot spring earlier, I think that we'd be able to sleep well and wake up feeling better.

name: 甘奈
text:
そうそう！　……あ！
でも──
trans: Right! Ah! But,

name: 甘奈
text: 温泉に入っても今日は終わらないよ……！
trans: Just because we're done with the bath, that doesn't mean that the day's over!

name: 甜花
text: え……どういうこと……？
trans: Eh? What do you mean?

name: 甘奈
text: えへ！　それは後でのお楽しみ！
trans: Ehe, just look forward to it later!

name: 甘奈
text: とりあえず、今は温泉にゴー！
trans: Anyways, time to hit the bath!

name: 甘奈
text: もうお布団敷いてくれてるんだ～
trans: The futons are all laid out now.

name: 甜花
text:
わあ……ふかふか……
……おやすみなさい……
trans: Aah... so fluffy... good night...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん、お布団気持ちいいのはわかるけど
寝るのはちょっと早いよ～！
trans: Tenka, I know how the futon feels so nice but it's a little bit too early to sleep!

name: 甘奈
text: まだまだ夜は終わらないんだから☆
trans: The night has just began!

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈ね、いっぱい遊ぶもの持ってきたんだ～
trans: You see, I brought a lot of things that we can play with.

name: 甜花
text: それって、お風呂に入る前に言ってた、お楽しみ……？
trans: Is that what you meant earlier before we took a bath?

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、正解☆
千雪さんが戻ってきたら遊ぼ～
trans: Ehehe, correct. Let's play once Chiyuki comes back.

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん、何持ってきたの……？
trans: Na-chan, what did you bring?

name: 甘奈
text:
えっとね～、トランプでしょ、ボードゲームでしょ～
他にも、まだまだあるよっ
trans: Well, I have some playing cards and some board games. There's also many others.

name: 甜花
text:
そんなにいっぱい……
すごい……
trans: You brought that much? Wow.

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ☆
３人でこうやってお泊りなんて、あんまりできないし
trans: Ehehe, the three of us don't really get many chances of staying together like this.

name: 甘奈
text:
色んなことして遊びたいなって思ったら
いっぱいになっちゃった
trans: When I started to think of the things I want to play with you two, it just turned out to be so many.

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん……
trans: Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text:
ねえねえ、千雪さんが戻ってくる前に
準備しとこうよ
trans: Say, let's get things ready before Chiyuki gets here.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
最初は、何にしよう……？
trans:
Okay...
What should we play first?

name: 甘奈
text:
どうしよ？
甜花ちゃんは何したい？
trans: What should we do? Tenka, what do you want to play?

name: 甜花
text:
えっと、えっと……
や、やっぱり……トランプ……？
trans: Umm, well... M-Maybe... playing cards?

name: 甘奈
text:
定番だもんね☆
じゃあ、なんの遊びがいいかな～
trans: Well, playing cards is a must. Okay, I wonder what should we play with this.

name: 甜花
text:
３人で……
えっと、神経衰弱とか、かな……？
trans: Since there's three of us... umm, maybe "Pairs" or something?

name: 甘奈
text: いいね～☆
trans: That's a good idea.

name: 甘奈
text:
それじゃ、すぐできるように
先にトランプ並べておこっか
trans: Alright, let's lay out the cards so that we can play right away.

name: 甘奈
text: ──よし、準備完了☆
trans: There, all done.

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……なかなか戻ってこないね……
trans: Chiyuki... sure is taking a long time to come back...

name: 甘奈
text:
ね～、それじゃあ……
千雪さんが戻るまでちょっとだけ──
trans: I know, right. In that case, while Chiyuki isn't around,

name: 甘奈
text:
ふかふかのお布団にー……
ドーン！
trans: I'll jump in to the fluffy futon. DON!

name: 甘奈
text: えへ！　気持ちいいー
trans: Ehe, this feels so nice.

name: 甜花
text:
わあ……！
て、甜花も、やりたい……！
trans: Ah! T-Tenka wants to do it too!

name: 甜花
text:
け、けど……
お布団、ふかふかで……本当に、寝ちゃうかも……？
trans: B-But... the futon's so fluffy... Tenka might fall asleep for real...

name: 甘奈
text:
ちょっとくらいなら大丈夫だよ～
ふぁ～……お布団気持ちいい～
trans: It won't hurt to do it a little. Hwaa... The futon's feels so nice...

name: 千雪
text:
遅くなってごめんなさい……！
旅館の人と少し話し込んじゃって——
trans: I'm so sorry I took so long! I lost track of time talking to the people here at the inn.

name: 甜花
text:
あっ、千雪さん……
しー……
trans: Ah, Chiyuki. Ssh.

name: 千雪
trans: Huh? Oh.

name: 甘奈
text: すー……すー……
trans: Zzz... zzz...

name: 千雪
text:
甘奈ちゃん……
疲れちゃってたのね
trans: Amana must've been really tired.

name: 甜花
text:
うん、いっぱい歩いたし、いっぱい遊んだから……
温泉にも入ったし……
trans: Yes, we did walked quite a lot and really enjoyed ourselves... We even took a bath so...

name: 甜花
text: ……あの、千雪さん
trans: Umm, Chiyuki...

name: 千雪
text: ……なあに？
trans: What is it?

name: 甜花
text: なーちゃん……今日ずっと、楽しそうだった……
trans: Na-chan... really enjoyed herself this day...

name: 甜花
text:
楽しい旅行が……もっと、楽しくなったのは……
千雪さんの、おかげ……
trans: This fun trip... became even more enjoyable... because you were with us, Chiyuki...

name: 甜花
text: ……ありがと、千雪さん
trans: Thank you, Chiyuki...

name: 千雪
text:
……甜花ちゃん
私もふたりと旅行に来れて、とっても楽しかったわ
trans: Tenka, I had a lot of fun two with you two bringing me along.

name: 千雪
text: ──だから、私の方こそありがとうって言わせて
trans: Which is why, allow me to say my thanks.

name: 甘奈
text: すぅ……すぅ……
trans: Zzz... zzz...

name: 甜花
text:
……なーちゃん、
すごく気持ちよさそうに、寝てる……
trans: Na-chan seems to be sleeping soundly...

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃん、見てたら……ふあぁ
甜花も、眠くなってきちゃった……かも……
trans: Looking at Na-chan sleeping... Hwaa... makes Tenka feel sleepy... herself...

name: 千雪
text:
そうね、私も……
今日はちょっとはしゃぎすぎちゃったかしら……
trans: I feel the same way... maybe we did get a little too carried away.

name: 千雪
text:
そろそろ私たちも寝よっか
朝にお風呂もあるしね♪
trans: How about we go to bed ourselves? We do have to take a bath tomorrow morning.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
明日も、いっぱい遊びたいし……
trans: Yes... Tenka wants to play a lot too tomorrow...

name: 甘奈
text:
……すー、すー……
……えへへ……ずっと一緒……んぅ……
trans: Zzz... zzz... ehehe... together forever... mmm...
